ds_grid_get_max: This function can be used to find the maximum value for all the cells found within the defined region of a grid, as shown in the image below:
The left cell column of the region.
The top cell row of the region.
The right cell column of the region.
The bottom cell row of the region.
The above code will set the variable "val" to the maximum value contained within the given region of the DS grid indexed in the variable "grid".
